existing_features.title: Generate a fixed PIX QR code in the payment checkout flow using the email key proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com
Implement PIX payload generation logic in frontend/src/lib/payments/pixPayload.ts to create valid PIX QR code strings
Integrate QR code display component in CheckoutPage.tsx to render the PIX QR code when PIX payment method is selected
